channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for GA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for GA

item.description:

item.title: Report E-2024030162
item.description:
Report E-2024030162

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-11T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-28
  • City: KENNESAW
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On February 28, 2024, one (!) 5-gallon pail of Zepa Lume was damaged by a skid and released approximately four (4) ounces of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Hull's Environmental Services (HES) to remediate the impacted site. Crews observed that R+L personnel had cleaned the impacted areas. HES personnel containerized the singular damaged carton into one (1) 55-gallon drum which was staged onsite for future disposal.

item.title: Report X-2024021753
item.description:
Report X-2024021753

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-07T15:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-21
  • City: ELLENWOOD
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE DISCOVERED LEAKING IN THE LOADSIDE AREA. CAPS OF BOTTLES BECAME LOOSE DURING HANDLING. PACKAGE SECURED IN HAZMAT DRUM AND TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT STATION FOR PROCESSING. DescribePack: CAPS OF BOTTLES BECAME LOOSE. DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: UPON DISCOVERY, PACKAGE SECURED IN PLASTIC BAG AND HAZMAT DRUM.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Item was being loaded when it was noticed that the box was leaking on one corner side of the package. Propper PPE equipment was used to prevent further leakage. The package was placed in a Hazmat bag and tote DescribePack: loose cap DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was placed in hazmat bag and tote
